name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】1st generation Princess Party♪♪【#ホロ1期生6周年】 [fWXjydrUZo8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Hololive 1st Generation members performing a medley including 'Kaguya no Shiro de Odoritai'.
Natsuiro Matsuri solo performance of 'Bansanka' sitting on a swing.

subtitles.original: 今宵の夢で踊りたい
subtitles.english: I want to dance in tonight's dream

subtitles.original: 今宵の夢よ永遠に
subtitles.english: Tonight's dream forever

subtitles.original: 明日のことは忘れたいの
subtitles.english: I want to forget about tomorrow

subtitles.original: 私は赤い薔薇の姫よ
subtitles.english: I am the red rose princess

subtitles.original: 優しくさらわれたい
subtitles.english: I want to be gently whisked away

subtitles.original: そっと囁いて
subtitles.english: Whisper softly

subtitles.original: 意味ありげに目をそらす
subtitles.english: Avoid eye contact suggestively

subtitles.original: あなたは白い月の騎士
subtitles.english: You are the white moon knight

subtitles.original: 触れた手がまだ熱い
subtitles.english: The hand that touched is still hot

subtitles.original: のがさずに抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Hold me tight and don't let go

subtitles.original: この奇跡を恋と呼ぶのね
subtitles.english: This miracle is called love, isn't it

subtitles.original: おいで おいで 情熱でダンスあげ
subtitles.english: Come on, come on, dance with passion

subtitles.original: おいでよ おいで かぐやの城へ
subtitles.english: Come, come to Kaguya's Castle

subtitles.original: 迷いも飲み込むアン・ドゥ・トロワ
subtitles.english: Un, deux, trois, swallowing up even hesitation

subtitles.original: 手も足もパッショネイト
subtitles.english: Passionate from head to toe

subtitles.original: 踊ろ 踊ろ 止まらない遊び
subtitles.english: Let's dance, let's dance, a non-stop amusement

subtitles.original: 踊ろや 踊ろ かぐやの城で
subtitles.english: Let's dance, let's dance, in Kaguya's Castle

subtitles.original: 星座が織りなすピカピカ私を
subtitles.english: For the sparkling me woven by the constellations,

subtitles.original: 待ってて
subtitles.english: please wait for me

subtitles.original: きらめく星に誓う心
subtitles.english: My heart swears to the twinkling stars

subtitles.original: 儚い夢でいいわ
subtitles.english: A fleeting dream is just fine

subtitles.original: 明日は 明日の風が吹くの
subtitles.english: Tomorrow, the winds of tomorrow will blow

subtitles.original: 明日は 明日の風が吹くの
subtitles.english: Tomorrow, the winds of tomorrow will blow

subtitles.original: 私は黒い薔薇の姫よ
subtitles.english: I am the black rose princess

subtitles.original: 激しくさらわれたい
subtitles.english: I want to be intensely whisked away

subtitles.original: だから微笑んで
subtitles.english: So, please smile

subtitles.original: 追いかけてと目が誘う
subtitles.english: My eyes invite you to chase me

subtitles.original: あなたも黒い月の騎士
subtitles.english: You too are the black moon knight

subtitles.original: 瞳の奥は熱い
subtitles.english: The depths of your eyes are hot

subtitles.original: つかまえて抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Catch me and hold me tight

subtitles.original: この奇跡は恋を呼ぶのね
subtitles.english: This miracle calls for love, doesn't it

subtitles.original: 一緒に行こう！
subtitles.english: Let's go together!

subtitles.original: 気づいてよ！
subtitles.english: Notice me!

subtitles.original: 他の人を見ちゃいや！
subtitles.english: Don't look at anyone else!

subtitles.original: 私だけを見て！
subtitles.english: Look only at me!

subtitles.original: 後悔するわよ！
subtitles.english: You'll regret it!

subtitles.original: 楽しもう！
subtitles.english: Let's have fun!

subtitles.original: 早くしなさいよ！
subtitles.english: Hurry up!

subtitles.original: いじわるですね
subtitles.english: You're mean

subtitles.original: いいの？
subtitles.english: Is it okay?

subtitles.original: 私は赤い薔薇の姫よ
subtitles.english: I am the red rose princess

subtitles.original: 優しくさらわれたい
subtitles.english: I want to be gently whisked away

subtitles.original: そっと囁いて
subtitles.english: Whisper softly

subtitles.original: 意味ありげに目をそらす
subtitles.english: Avoid eye contact suggestively

subtitles.original: あなたは白い月の騎士
subtitles.english: You are the white moon knight

subtitles.original: 触れた手がまだ熱い
subtitles.english: The hand that touched is still hot

subtitles.original: のがさずに抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Hold me tight and don't let go

subtitles.original: この奇跡を恋と呼ぶのね
subtitles.english: This miracle is called love, isn't it

subtitles.original: 晩餐歌
subtitles.english: Dinner Song

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲:tuki.
subtitles.english: Lyrics/Composition: tuki.

subtitles.original: 君を泣かすから だから一緒には居れないな
subtitles.english: Since I make you cry, that's why we can't be together

subtitles.original: 君を泣かすから 早く忘れて欲しいんだ
subtitles.english: Since I make you cry, I want you to forget me soon

subtitles.original: 人間だからね たまには違うものも食べたいね
subtitles.english: We're only human, so sometimes we want to eat something different

subtitles.original: 君を泣かすから そう君を泣かすから
subtitles.english: Since I make you cry, yes, since I make you cry

subtitles.original: でも味気ないないないんだよね
subtitles.english: But it's just so bland and boring

subtitles.original: 会いたくなんだよね 君以外会いたくないんだよね
subtitles.english: I start wanting to see you, I don't want to see anyone but you

subtitles.original: なんて勝手だんね
subtitles.english: How selfish of me

subtitles.original: 大体曖昧なんだよね 愛の存在証明なんて
subtitles.english: Everything's so ambiguous, like a proof of love's existence

subtitles.original: 君が教えてくれないか
subtitles.english: Won't you tell me?

subtitles.original: 何十回の夜を過ごしたって 得られぬような
subtitles.english: Even after spending dozens of nights, it's something I can't obtain

subtitles.original: 「愛してる」を並べてみて
subtitles.english: Try lining up all those 'I love you's

subtitles.original: 何十回の夜を過ごしたって 得られぬような
subtitles.english: Even after spending dozens of nights, it's something I can't obtain

subtitles.original: 最高のフルコースを頂戴
subtitles.english: Give me the finest full-course meal

subtitles.original: 君を泣かすから 君を泣かすから きっと一生は...
subtitles.english: Since I make you cry, since I make you cry, surely a lifetime...
